import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './PatientRegistrationForm.css'; import backgroundLogo from './images/Carecloud.png'; import backgroundLog from './images/image.png'; const PatientRegistrationForm = () => { const [gender, setGender] = useState(''); // State to track selected gender const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', address: '', birthday: '', }); const handleGenderChange = (event) => { setGender(event.target.value); }; const handleChange = (event) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value, }); }; const handleSubmit = () => { alert('Form Submitted!'); // Perform form submission logic here }; const handleClear = () => { setGender(''); setFormData({ firstName: '', lastName: '', address: '', birthday: '', }); }; return (
